item.title: Breakout Init
item.description: I’m trying to use the wonderful Learn OpenGL resource to make a breakout game in C++

item.title: Devlog Init
item.description: This is a third attempt at making a blog I’m happy with and keep up with. Currently there’s too much learning too do, too many tests, too many contracts, too many projects. I can’t keep up. Is this what eery developer deals with. Maybe just anyone and everyone. Or maybe I’m not cut out for the lifestyle I claim to partake in. Either way I need some way to jot things down.
